  • by.epam.agency.validator.constants.ValidatorRegex 
    Modifier and Type Constant Field Value
    public static final java.lang.String LOGIN "[A-Za-z0-9_]+"
    public static final java.lang.String PASSWORD "^(?=.*[0-9]+.*)(?=.*[a-zA-Z]+.*)[0-9a-zA-Z]{6,}$"
    public static final java.lang.String PHONE "[0-9*#+() -]*"
    public static final java.lang.String PROPER_NAME "^[a-zA-Z]+(([\',. -][a-zA-Z ])?[a-zA-Z]*)*$"
